channel.title: How can i get Date and Time with WP77 on mangOH Red
channel.description:
Hi,
I need to have access to date and Time for my application but i don't know how to get it.
I can see, in my logs, that the mangoh have it but i don't know how i can use it **Jun 28 14:26:13** swi-mdm9x28-wp user.info Legato: INFO |
Can someone plz help me?
Regards, Baptiste

item.title: How can i get Date and Time with WP77 on mangOH Red
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
You can see here

Legato Forum – 3 Apr 19

Legato startup date change?

#include “legato.h” #include “interfaces.h” // NEW_EPOCH_TIME_IN_MS is 2019. 1. 1. 00:00:00:000 #define NEW_EPOCH_TIME_IN_MS 1546300800000 COMPONENT_INIT { const uint64_t newTime = 1546300800000; uint64_t msPastEpochPtr = 0; ...

Read full topic
item.source: How can i get Date and Time with WP77 on mangOH Red

Thx but do you have any example for using le_clk_GetAbsoluteTime()?

item.title: How can i get Date and Time with WP77 on mangOH Red
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
You can call le_clk_GetAbsoluteTime() or linux ‘date’ command.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i get Date and Time with WP77 on mangOH Red
item.dc:creator: baptistemarc
item.description:
Hi,

I need to have access to date and Time for my application but i don’t know how to get it.

I can see, in my logs, that the mangoh have it but i don’t know how i can use it
Jun 28 14:26:13 swi-mdm9x28-wp user.info Legato: INFO |

Can someone plz help me?

Regards,
Baptiste
